Package com.yukiemeralis.blogspot.zenith.utils

Class PrintUtils

java.lang.Object
com.yukiemeralis.blogspot.zenith.utils.PrintUtils
public class PrintUtils extends Object
A collection of utilities for printing text to players, entities, and the console.
Author:
Yuki_emeralis
